Methods

ContainsPosition(Position)

Checks to see if the specified position is within the tissue region. Definition should be such that regions do not overlap, i.e. photon can only be in one region at a time.

bool ContainsPosition(Position position)

Parameters

position Position

The position to test

Returns

bool

True if the specified position is within the tissue region, false otherwise

OnBoundary(Position)

Determines if photon on boundary of tissue region. Some checks require adjustments for floating point error in precision of Position.

bool OnBoundary(Position position)

Parameters

position Position

The position to test

Returns

bool

True if specified position if on tissue region boundary, false otherwise

RayIntersectBoundary(Photon, out double)

Checks if the specified photon will intersect the region boundary

bool RayIntersectBoundary(Photon photon, out double distanceToBoundary)

Parameters

photon Photon

Photon to check for intersection (including Position, Direction, and S)

distanceToBoundary double

The distance to the next boundary

Returns

bool

True if photon will intersect the region boundary, false otherwise

Remarks

Use this method if the distance is required
